languages.text: {n}Фактотум слегка ослабляет ремни на флак-жилете и довольно охает.{/n} "Она шла великолепно, пока ее грубо не прервали мятежные мутанты. Боюсь, мне пришлось временно реквизировать оружие и обмундирование для себя и моего небольшого ополчения. Но не волнуйтесь, каждый израсходованный патрон будет учтен и внесен в графу "незапланированное изничтожение еретиков".

{n}The Factotum loosens the straps on his flak vest slightly and gives a satisfied groan.{/n} "It was going splendidly until we were rudely interrupted by the traitorous mutants. I am afraid I have temporarily had to requisition weapons and uniforms for myself and my militia. But do not worry: every spent bullet will be accounted for and added to the 'unplanned extermination of heretics' column in the ledger."
languages.original_text: {n}Фактотум слегка ослабляет ремни на флак-жилете и довольно охает.{/n} "Она шла великолепно, пока ее грубо не прервали мятежные мутанты. Боюсь, мне пришлось временно реквизировать оружие и обмундирование для себя и моего небольшого ополчения. Но не волнуйтесь, каждый израсходованный патрон будет учтен и внесен в графу "незапланированное изничтожение еретиков".

I am afraid I've had to temporarily requisition weapons and uniforms for myself and my militia. But don't worry, every spent bullet will be accounted for and added to the 'unplanned extermination of heretics' column in the ledger."

languages.text: {n}El Factótum afloja ligeramente las tiras de su chaleco antimetralla y gruñe con satisfacción.{/n} «Todo iba perfectamente hasta que nos interrumpieron los mutantes traidores de forma muy desconsiderada. Me temo que tuve que requisar armas y uniformes para mí y para mi milicia, pero no se preocupe: cada bala utilizada se catalogará y se añadirá a la columna de "exterminio no planificado de herejes" en el libro de cuentas».
languages.original_text: {n}The Factotum loosens the straps on his flak vest slightly and gives a satisfied groan.{/n} "It was going splendidly until we were rudely interrupted by the traitorous mutants. I am afraid I have temporarily had to requisition weapons and uniforms for myself and my militia. But do not worry: every spent bullet will be accounted for and added to the 'unplanned extermination of heretics' column in the ledger."

traits.locale_text: {n}El Factótum afloja ligeramente las tiras de su chaleco antimetralla y gruñe con satisfacción.{/n} «Todo iba perfectamente hasta que nos interrumpieron los mutantes traidores de forma muy desconsiderada. Me temo que tuve que requisar armas y uniformes para mí y para mi milicia, pero no se preocupe: cada bala utilizada se catalogará y se añadirá a la columna de "exterminio no planificado de herejes" en el libro de cuentas».

languages.text: {n}ファクトタムはフラック・ベストのストラップを少し緩め、気持ちよさそうにうめいた。{/n}「裏切り者の変異体に、乱暴に邪魔されるまでは順調でした。申し訳ないのですが、一時的に武器と軍服を徴用せざる負えなくなりまして。しかし、ご心配には及びません。使用済みの銃弾はすべて、台帳の『異端者の計画外駆除』欄に追加しております」
languages.original_text: {n}The Factotum loosens the straps on his flak vest slightly and gives a satisfied groan.{/n} "It was going splendidly until we were rudely interrupted by the traitorous mutants. I am afraid I have temporarily had to requisition weapons and uniforms for myself and my militia. But do not worry: every spent bullet will be accounted for and added to the 'unplanned extermination of heretics' column in the ledger."

languages.text: {n}高阶顾问稍微松了松防弹背心的带子，随后满意地哼了一声。{/n}“原本一切都进展得很顺利，但一群叛乱的变种人突然冲出来，打断了检查工作。于是我不得不征用一批武器和制服，把我和我的手下武装起来。不过，您不用担心，发射的每颗子弹都会被记录下来，结算到账簿的‘计划外消灭异端分子’这部分。”
languages.original_text: {n}The Factotum loosens the straps on his flak vest slightly and gives a satisfied groan.{/n} "It was going splendidly until we were rudely interrupted by the traitorous mutants. I am afraid I have temporarily had to requisition weapons and uniforms for myself and my militia. But do not worry: every spent bullet will be accounted for and added to the 'unplanned extermination of heretics' column in the ledger."

languages.text: {n}Das Faktotum lockert die Gurte seiner Armaplastweste ein wenig und stöhnt zufrieden auf.{/n} "Es lief blendend, bis wir von den verräterischen Mutanten so rüde unterbrochen wurden. Ich fürchte, ich musste vorübergehend Waffen und Uniformen für mich und meine Miliz requirieren. Aber keine Sorge: Jede verschossene Kugel wird protokolliert und im Hauptbuch unter 'ungeplante Auslöschung von Ketzern' verbucht."
languages.original_text: {n}The Factotum loosens the straps on his flak vest slightly and gives a satisfied groan.{/n} "It was going splendidly until we were rudely interrupted by the traitorous mutants. I am afraid I have temporarily had to requisition weapons and uniforms for myself and my militia. But do not worry: every spent bullet will be accounted for and added to the 'unplanned extermination of heretics' column in the ledger."

Aber keine Sorge: Jede verschossene Kugel wird protokolliert und im Hauptbuch unter 'ungeplante Auslöschung von Ketzern' verbucht."

languages.text: {n}Le factotum détend légèrement les courroies de sa veste pare-balles avec un soupir d'aise.{/n} « Tout se déroulait à merveille jusqu'à ce que ces mutants rebelles viennent brusquement nous interrompre. Je crains d'avoir dû réquisitionner temporairement des armes et des uniformes pour moi-même et ma milice. Mais ne vous inquiétez pas : chaque balle utilisée sera comptabilisée et ajoutée à la section "extermination non planifiée d'hérétiques" du livre de comptes. »
languages.original_text: {n}The Factotum loosens the straps on his flak vest slightly and gives a satisfied groan.{/n} "It was going splendidly until we were rudely interrupted by the traitorous mutants. I am afraid I have temporarily had to requisition weapons and uniforms for myself and my militia. But do not worry: every spent bullet will be accounted for and added to the 'unplanned extermination of heretics' column in the ledger."

languages.text: {n}Kâhya, savar yeleğinin kayışlarını hafifçe gevşetip memnuniyetle onaylıyor.{/n} "Hain mutantlar kabalık edip işimizi bölmeden evvel harika gidiyordu. Ben ve milislerim için birtakım silah ve üniforma lazım oldu, bunları almak durumunda kaldık. Endişeye lüzum yok, harcanan her merminin hesabı tutulup defterdeki 'kâfirlerin plansız imhası' sütununa geçirilecektir."
languages.original_text: {n}The Factotum loosens the straps on his flak vest slightly and gives a satisfied groan.{/n} "It was going splendidly until we were rudely interrupted by the traitorous mutants. I am afraid I have temporarily had to requisition weapons and uniforms for myself and my militia. But do not worry: every spent bullet will be accounted for and added to the 'unplanned extermination of heretics' column in the ledger."
